description:
The #1 American duelist Bandit Keith’s gang kidnaps Jonouchi to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field.  As Yugi and friends search for him, Jonouchi faces Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!  Jonouchi is all alone in the battle this time!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恐怖! リビングデッドの呼び声
